The ocean had always been a source of life for the people. They would fish, swim, and play in the water every day. But now, the ocean was gone, and they had no idea what to do.
Some people tried to find other sources of water, but there was none to be found. The land was dry and barren, and the people were dying of thirst.
Others turned to the government for help, but they offered no solution. The people were on their own, and they had to find a way to survive.
A group of scientists arrived, and they said they had a plan. They proposed to build a massive desalination plant that would turn saltwater into freshwater.
The people were skeptical, but they had no other options. They agreed to the plan, and the scientists got to work.
